description: Detects the invocation of TabTip via CLSID as seen when JuicyPotatoNG is used on a system in brute force mode
author: Florian Roth
name: Local Privilege Escalation Indicator TabTip
query: (winlog.channel:"System" AND winlog.event_id:"10001" AND param1:"C:\Program Files\Common Files\microsoft shared\ink\TabTip.exe" AND param2:"2147943140" AND param3:"{054AAE20-4BEA-4347-8A35-64A533254A9D}")
